description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
66 Aberdeen Park, Islington, London, N5 2LB

TPO Reference:
T70 – Lime of LBI TPO Mildmay (No.2) 1977
T71 and T72 – Horse Chestnuts of LBI TPO Mildmay (No.2) 1977

PO Number:
T090527

Work specifications:
1 x Lime (T70) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO Mildmay (No.2) 1977
Crown reduce to the last previous points of reduction, approx. 25%
2 x Horse Chestnuts (T71&T72) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO Mildmay (No.2) 1977
Crown reduce to the last previous points of reduction, approx. 25%
 
Decision:
Approve Subject to conditions
decision_conditions: The original specification included the application to remove the Horse Chestnut T71 of LBI TPO Mildmay (No.2) 1977, these works were replaced following negotiation with the applicant, to the lesser works of crown reduce to the last previous points of reduction.
